title: "Artificial intelligence could be used to detect weapons in Fort Smith schools"
excerpt: "Martin Mahan, the district's deputy superintendent, said the system uses the district's existing cameras with artificial intelligence to detect weapons and send the footage to be examined by experts. He said if there is a threat, the school impacted would immediately start lockdown procedures."
